channel.title: +2 Kamesvari Agrahara Near Nedunuru Village on वेदे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +2 Kamesvari Agrahara Near Nedunuru Village on वेदे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: 1 Lanka (1912–1999)
item.description: At 2:30 on a sunny February afternoon, three men are already waiting on the verandah steps. After some time, Lanka, on the arm of a granddaughter, appears unsteadily with badly swollen knees, eyes squinched against the brightness. He is deposited slowly, carefully into the dimple between stacks of books and papers, his work-nest. Heavy gold earrings tug his earlobes down, wide gold rings cover four fingers of the right hand, a gold armband rides as a torque on a pale fore
